Package weka.core.logging

Class Summary
ConsoleLogger A simple logger that outputs the logging information in the console.
FileLogger A simple file logger, that just logs to a single file.
Logger Abstract superclass for all loggers.
OutputLogger A logger that logs all output on stdout and stderr to a file.
OutputLogger.OutputPrintStream A print stream class to capture all data from stdout and stderr.
 

Enum Summary
Logger.Level The logging level.
